text.section:
On issuing a traffic citation, the police officer:
Shall ask the person to acknowledge receipt of a copy of the citation, as required under § 1-605 of the Courts Article; and
If the person refuses to do so, shall advise the person that failure to acknowledge receipt may lead to the person's arrest.

section.section: On being advised that failure to acknowledge receipt of a copy of a citation may lead to arrest, the person may not refuse to acknowledge receipt.

If the person continues to refuse to do so, the police officer may arrest the person for violation of this section or, as provided in § 26-202(a)(5) of this subtitle, for the original charge, or both.
